name: SOUL
description: Fantasy Bear NFT is a collection of 5,000 unique characters. They are adventurers who like to be close to nature and are loyal friends of Mpace. There are 4 levels of rarity: common 50%, rare 35%, very rare 10 %, 5% of the legendary. Ordinary: 50%, they are simple design, solid color background, without accessories, they are cute, innocent, like to be close to nature.
